TopicTitle: [Art] Anarch Mortaire (Treachery Of The Stars character)

Articles.Content:
Over on the TwoKinds Forum, I\'m in this RP called Treachery Of The Stars, its supposed to be like a sci-fi version of A Game Of Thrones.

But onto the artwork. The RP\'s Game Master has several characters, and one of them is Anarch Mortaire, King of the Anarchy Systems, which are Galactic Rimworlds. The image he used was taken from [i think] Google Images, so it wasn\'t exactly what he wanted. He said it looked too steampunk. So I made a sci-fi-ified version.

Here it is.

He does have a left arm, doesn\'t he?

Anywho, i can see improvement in your work, i\'d love to see you continue.

He does have a left arm, doesn\'t he?

Anywho, i can see improvement in your work, i\'d love to see you continue.

Yeah, its just hard to see. I didn\'t have a scanner to use, so I did it with the original image in the bottom layer.
